name: WESTERN ORGANIZATION OF RESOURCE COUNCILS
description: Grassroots network of community organizations in the west working on rural policies.
sampleDescriptions: Promoting rural electric cooperative loan forgiveness within the Rural Utilities Service of USDA, in return for environmentally friendly, low carbon investments, e.g., renewable energy.
